public enum InstType {
	ADDI, ADD, BEQ, ...
}

Instruction {
	int address
	byte[4] word
	InstType type
}

Processor {
	byte[] memory
	pc int
	void execute() {
		execute(new Instruction(memory[pc]));
		pc += 4;
	}
	void execute(Instruction inst) {
		switch inst.type {
			case ADDI:
				execute(new InstAddi(inst));
				break;
		}
	}
}
	
001000dddddsssssrrrrr00000000000 = ADD
010ooodddddsssssiiiiiiiiiiiiiiii = CAT3
00000000000000000000000000000000
00011100000000000000000000000000
11100000000000000000000000000000
00000011111000000000000000000000 = 0x03E00000
00000000000111110000000000000000 = 0x001F0000
00000000000000001111100000000000 = 0x0000F800
00000000000000001111111111111111 = 0x0000FFFF
00000100000000000000000000000000 = BEQ
00001000000000000000000000000000 = BNE
00001100000000000000000000000000 = BGTZ
